# 云上加速迎接中国互联网新周期

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yunshang-jiasu-yingjie-zhongguo-hulianwang-xin-zhouqi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yunshang-jiasu-yingjie-zhongguo-hulianwang-xin-zhouqi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yunshang-jiasu-yingjie-zhongguo-hulianwang-xin-zhouqi
yunshang-jiasu-yingjie-zhongguo-hulianwang-xin-zhouqi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yunshang-jiasu-yingjie-zhongguo-hulianwang-xin-zhouqi
yunshang-jiasu-yingjie-zhongguo-hulianwang-xin-zhouqi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
